title: Hyperspace by HTML5 UP
paragraphs: I am currently looking for a Co-op from august 2024 to next fall 2025
I will be building 5 AI projects in 5 weeks, and as my final project, I will take a startup's current backlog and build it to meet their business requirements.

Assess the quality of AI-generated writing based on rubrics such as factuality, completeness, brevity, and grammatical correctness
								Review and provide feedback on the work of other writers
								Create high-quality original responses to prompts to guide the AI model's responses
								Gain experience in the field of AI and contribute to the improvement of AI models

Ensured a safe environment by engaging with guests about rules
								Cultivated a welcoming environment by managing weeds, flowers, and chickens
								Conducted multiple tours around the garden for new guests during the winter event

Implemented HTTP requests for data retrieval and JSON parsing
										Incorporated the youtube_player_flutter plugin for video playback, details, and thumbnails and the Google Cloud API key for the search functionality
										Developed features for searching videos, managing favorites, and viewing history
										Ensured cross-platform compatibility using both Android and IOS emulators

Developed a C# front-end application using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern in Visual Studio
										Developed a C# frontend application to consume data from a RESTful web service
										Incorporated jQuery, BootStrap, and Datatables plugins for UI enhancements

Developed a professional website for the iSchool by fetching data from Ischool's web service API using a proxy server
										Used React hooks for managing state and side effects in the application 
										Utilized Material-UI components for designing and implementing user-friendly interfaces

Developed a database application for an academic department to facilitate collaboration between faculty and student researchers using search functionalities with keywords
										Implemented a system using abstract methods to store abstracts of faculty and student research interests, creating a small-scale digital library
										Adapted JDBC for MySQL database connectivity, executing SQL operation and handling exceptions effectively
										Ensuring security through password encryption using the SHA-1 hashing algorithm for user login

Developed an AI Algorithm Trading Bot using Python, Pandas, and TensorFlow
										Utilizes LSTM (Neural Network) and unsupervised learning for stock prediction, with results visualized using matplotlib
										Advancing skills in Python, Artificial intelligence, algorithms, and data manipulation
